headline: Show HN: Prepare your tax return on the command-line
description:
Hi HN,

I wanted to be able to easily compute my tax return using simple open-source software and be able to trust that it was correct. So I'm building that software, with a goal of keeping it simple to add and maintain tax forms/logic so that portion can be crowdsourced.

At its core, HabuTax, is a very simple dependency solver. The tax logic is modular and specified at line-level granularity (one formula per line per tax form). This means there is less to keep in your head when implementing, since each field must only consider its own inputs and output, making it easier and less error-prone.

I would love your help, whether that is trying it out and reporting bugs/suggesting improvements, implementing additional forms or adding support for more scenarios, or submitting anonymous tax data to help build a test suite.

Thanks!
headline_zh-Hans: Show HN: 在命令行上准备你的退税
headline_zh-Hant: Show HN: 在命令行上準備你的退稅
description_zh-Hans:
Hi HN,

我希望能够使用简单的开源软件轻松计算我的退税，并且能够相信它是正确的。因此，我正在构建该软件，目标是保持简单的添加和维护税务表格/逻辑，以便部分可以众包。

在其核心，HabuTax，是一个非常简单的依赖性解决方法。税收逻辑是模块化的，并以行级粒度指定（每个税表每行一个公式）。这意味着在实施时，你要记住的东西更少，因为每个字段必须只考虑它自己的输入和输出，这使得它更容易，更不容易出错。

我希望得到你的帮助，无论是尝试它并报告错误/建议改进，实施额外的形式或添加

我希望得到你的幫助，無論是嘗試它並報告錯誤/建議改進，實施額外的形式或添加
